name: Christmas Taxi
description:
In the big city, people often live far away from each other.
Drive your cab and help people meet their friends, lovers, or relatives to celebrate Christmas.

Tips:
Control your cab with WASD.
return to the main menu - Esc 

Creators:

  • Shelhelix#5610 - that's me. 
  • warezzko?!#1128 - a good old friend. Created a fantastic city for this game

Also thanks to all third-party assets providers: 

  • www.fesliyanstudios.com - for fabulous BGMs
  • http://dotween.demigiant.com/ - for smooth UI animations
  • https://www.ricimi.com/ - for frozen GUI asset pack
  • https://www.polyperfect.com/ - for all low-poly models
  • https://github.com/MSchmoecker - for traffic simulation system

This is an entry for Cozy winter jam 2022 - https://itch.io/jam/cozy-winter-jam-2022
